node.title: Major hint revealed about who may replace Tim Paine as Aussie men's captain
node.alt: An image of the digital cover of the official Ashes video game featuring Meg Lanning (left) and Pat Cummins.
node.description: In what may be a sign as to who takes Paine's place as men's Test skipper, Pat Cummins is added to the cover of the digital version of the official Ashes video game.
node.content:
["The fallout from Tim Paine's shock resignation as Australian men's Test captain continues, with the former skipper removed from the cover of the digital version of the officially licensed Ashes video game.", "Paine stood down as men's Test captain last Friday after revealing his involvement in a sexting incident with a woman in 2017.", "Cricket Australia (CA) launched an investigation into the incident the following year and\u00a0cleared\u00a0Paine of wrongdoing.", "Paine's resignation shocked the Australian and global cricket community, with CA yet to announce who will replace him as captain\u00a0ahead of the men's Ashes series, which begins\u00a0at the Gabba on December 8.", "", "
Tim Paine resigned as Australian men's Test captain during an emotional media conference last week.(ABC News: Luke Bowden)
", "It also forced the release\u00a0of video game Cricket 22: The Official Game of The Ashes to be pushed back a week to December 2, as its\u00a0developer needed to replace Paine on the cover.", "CA's website confirmed Big Ant Studios had released the updated cover art on Tuesday, with Cummins taking the place of Paine\u00a0alongside Australian women's captain, Meg Lanning.", "Cummins \u2014 the men's vice-captain \u2014 has been widely tipped to succeed Paine as Test skipper for the Ashes.", "While Cummins will feature on the cover of the digital version, CA's website said\u00a0the printed physical copies would\u00a0still feature Paine.", "The news comes after\u00a0Cricket Tasmania (CT) slammed CA's treatment of Paine, describing it as \"appalling\".", "CT\u00a0chairman Andrew Gaggin said CA had ignored the role Paine played as captain following the 2018 ball-tampering scandal in South Africa.", "\"Tim Paine has been a beacon for Australian cricket over the past four years and instrumental in salvaging the reputation of the national team after the calamity of Cape Town,\" he said in a CT statement.", "\"Yet, at a time when CA should have supported Tim, he was evidently regarded as dispensable.\"", "Cummins is firming as the favourite to replace Paine as captain, with Test great Adam Gilchrist saying the fast bowler was the ideal candidate.", "\"I've got no problems with him having first opportunity,\" Gilchrist said on Monday.", "\"They should have him if he's keen to do it and he must be reasonably happy to take the role, given he's vice-captain.\"", "", "
Cummins is regarded as the favourite to replace Paine as Test skipper.(AP: Asanka Brendon Ratnayake)
", "Paine is no certainty to be selected as Australia's wicketkeeper against England.", "Chairman of selectors George Bailey announced on Tuesday he would excuse himself from deciding on Paine's place in the Test XI, citing his friendship with his fellow Tasmanian."]
